Name: vm_custom_icons
Overview: Downloads and installs additional custom VM icons to the Unraid VM Manager.

windowsicons.Name: windows icons
windowsicons.Description: select yes or no to download windows vm icons

linuxicons.Name: linux icons
linuxicons.Description: select yes or no to download linux vm icons

freebsdicons.Name: freebsd icons
freebsdicons.Description: select yes or no to download freebsd vm icons

macosvmicons.Name: macos vm icons
macosvmicons.Description: select yes or no to download macos vm icons

otherosicons.Name: other os  icons
otherosicons.Description: select yes or no to download other vm icons

keepstockvmicons.Name: Keep Stock VM Icons
keepstockvmicons.Description: set to no to remove stock unraid vm icons

clearallicons&amp;redownloadaboveoneachs.Name: Clear all icons & redownload above on each start
clearallicons&amp;redownloadaboveoneachs.Description: set to yes to delete all vm icons. and redownload the above from github on every run of container

enablesucesstuneoniconload.Name: Enable sucess tune on icon load
enablesucesstuneoniconload.Description: Enable tune on sucess. (you must have a beep speaker)

timetowaitbeforeexit.Name: Time to wait before exit
timetowaitbeforeexit.Description: Time to wait before stopping container after syncing icons

vmmanagericonlocation.Name: vm manager icon location
vmmanagericonlocation.Description: location on server where Unraid stores vm icons (dont change this)
